msbt.message: Isn't Bunny Day great? I'm gonna go looking for eggs later, .I promised I'd have it for snack time. It's been on my calendar for months.
Bunny Day! Bunny Day! Bunny Day! Hey, have you met Zipper yet? He's in the plaza, .He's been hiding eggs everywhere. EVERYWHERE. I even found one in !
I've been taste testing the different candy-egg colors. So far they're all delicious. I like doing science!

Yay! Bunny Day is almost here! And that means eggs are gonna be in all kinds of weird places.Like in rocks! I was running and I bumped into a rock and a stone egg popped out! Isn't that cool?Then I talked to Wilbur who said eggs were coming out of rocks like crazy on Nook Miles Ticket islands!I love Bunny Day
Man, I'm sooooo excited for Bunny Day, !Hey, ever wondered why you find more wood eggs hitting coconut trees than any other kind of tree?Coconut trees don't hatch from eggsdo they?
Bunny Day is all about candy eggs, which makes it the best.<10_4 /> Come on, ! Get here faster!

Guess what? Guess what? Guess whaaat? I caught a fishexcept it wasn't a fish. It was a candy egg!It was so salty and tasty that I tried to catch moreand then I figured something out, !If you aim for a medium-sized fish, it might actually be an egg! Y'know, or just a boring, regular fish
